threads.title: the amd 216-0810005
threads.message:
the amd 216-0810005 a piece of shit gives pretty lines and half boot, when fucked with hot air dong and no lines.....
or is it one that i qualified for replacement ?

threads.title: the amd 216-0810005
threads.message: Replace GPU, good luck finding REAL new ones....
